Comment: This response provides a thorough explanation of the distinction between Sheol and Hades in relation to the fates of the righteous and unrighteous after death, drawing from both the Old and New Testaments. It effectively addresses the concern by highlighting the evolution of understanding regarding the afterlife destinations for the righteous and unrighteous. The integration of biblical references and theological analysis demonstrates a strong grasp of the Christian worldview on this topic.
